Isosurface.description:
Isosurface output item.

Parameters
----------
name : <class 'str'>
        field : typing.Literal['Cp', 'gradW', 'kOmega', 'Mach', 'mut', 'mutRatio', 'nuHat', 'primitiveVars', 'qcriterion', 'residualNavierStokes', 'residualTransition', 'residualTurbulence', 's', 'solutionNavierStokes', 'solutionTransition', 'solutionTurbulence', 'T', 'vorticity', 'wallDistance', 'numericalDissipationFactor', 'residualHeatSolver', 'VelocityRelative', 'lowMachPreconditionerSensor', 'p', 'rho', 'Coefficient of pressure', 'Gradient of primitive solution', 'k and omega', 'Mach number', 'Turbulent viscosity', 'Turbulent viscosity and freestream dynamic viscosity ratio', 'Spalart-Almaras variable', 'rho, u, v, w, p (density, 3 velocities and pressure)', 'Q criterion', 'N-S residual', 'Transition residual', 'Turbulence residual', 'Entropy', 'N-S solution', 'Transition solution', 'Turbulence solution', 'Temperature', 'Vorticity', 'Wall distance', 'NumericalDissipationFactor sensor', 'Heat equation residual', 'Velocity with respect to non-inertial frame', 'Low-Mach preconditioner factor', 'Pressure', 'Density']
        iso_value : <class 'float'>
    Expect non-dimensional value.

enum: Turbulent viscosity and freestream dynamic viscosity ratio
rho, u, v, w, p (density, 3 velocities and pressure)
Velocity with respect to non-inertial frame
field.title: Field

Isosurface.title: Isosurface

description:
Isosurface output settings.

Parameters
----------
frequency : <class 'int'> = -1
    Frequency (in number of physical time steps) at which output is saved.
    -1 is at end of simulation.
frequency_offset : <class 'int'> = 0
    Offset (in number of physical time steps) at which output animation is started.
    0 is at beginning of simulation.
output_format : typing.Literal['paraview', 'tecplot', 'both'] = paraview
        name : typing.Optional[str] = None
        entities : typing.Optional[abc.UniqueItemList[Isosurface]] = None
        output_fields : <class 'abc.UniqueAliasedStringList[Literal]'>
        output_type : typing.Literal['IsosurfaceOutput'] = IsosurfaceOutput

frequency.description:
Frequency (in number of physical time steps) at which output is saved.
        -1 is at end of simulation.
frequency.title: Frequency

frequency_offset.description:
Offset (in number of physical time steps) at which output animation is started.
        0 is at beginning of simulation.
frequency_offset.title: Frequency Offset

title: IsosurfaceOutput
